text:
Enchanted Labs - (San Francisco, CA) - Ex-Facebook co-founders.

ABOUT

Enchanted Labs is a funded, early stage, travel startup co-founded by two ex-Facebookers. Weâ€™re working on an innovative trip technology and looking for a engineer to join our small team on the ground level.

ROLE

Looking for a backend/fullstack engineer who has experience/interest in NLP, machine learning, or algorithms.

The challenge we're working on is pretty interesting so reach out if you think you might be a fit.

MORE INFO -http://www.likebucket.com/about

Or feel free to shoot me a line at Julia@EnchantedLabs.com.
